name: Lys
description:
Lys (which means "light" in danish) is a short relaxing experience about controlling a yellow fish of light.

Eat, grow, explore and relax.

Move with WASD, arrow keys or a controller.
I recommend to play with a controller.

Design and development: Francesco Laddomada (@tiollo)

Music: "Soaring" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
